info.name: SOCIALBLADE - Dark Theme
info.description: Social Blade extension theme for Magic Actions for Youtube, Youtube Umbra and BlackTube, but it will be working with all other dark styles too. Choose your style in Customize Settings.
info.additionalInfo: See also: Square Avatars on YouTube, Dark Cyan Theme for UserStyles, Dark Minimalistic Scrollbar
